headline: GAME ON: LOWE'S TO APPEAR IN MULTIPLE EA SPORTS TITLES FOR THE FIRST TIME
summary: Lowe's is collaborating with EA SPORTS™ to be featured in multiple EA SPORTS titles for the first time, including EA SPORTS FC™, Madden NFL and College Football. This collaboration significantly expands Lowe's presence in the digital gaming space, positioning the brand and its loyalty platform, MyLowe's Rewards, at the forefront of immersive fan experiences across multiple platforms and sports communities.

headline: A Look Back at Home Furnishing and Improvement Retail Stocks’ Q4 Earnings: Lowe's (NYSE:LOW) Vs The Rest Of The Pack
summary: The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how home furnishing and improvement retail stocks fared in Q4, starting with Lowe's (NYSE:LOW).
